advancements.colony4cc.colony_peripheral: Craft a Colony Peripheral, to access your colony from ComputerCraft computers
advancements.colony4cc.pocket_colony.des: Install a Colony Peripheral into an Pocket Computer, allowing you to access colony data on the go.
advancements.colony4cc.pocket_colony_wir: Install a Colonial Wireless Upgrade into an Pocket Computer, letting you access both colony data and wireless networking.
Upgrade your Colonial Wireless Upgrade to a Colonial Ender Upgrade and install it, increasing your wireless range immensely.
info.colony4cc.upgrade_merging:
Sticking these two peripherals together gives you an item that can be installed in a pocket computer to give you the features of both.

If you sneak-right-click the item in the air, you will tear them apart into the original two component peripherals.  The glue doesn't survive, however.
